meanings.sent1: The foetor from the garbage bin was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The foetor of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The foetor in the old gym socks could wake the dead.
meanings.sent4: The foetor of failure hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The foetor of decay lingered long after the meal was over.

meanings.definition: To emit a strong, offensive smell.
meanings.sent1: The dumpster foetored after days in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The flowers foetor attracted flies to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cheese foetored so strongly, it set off the smoke alarm.
meanings.sent4: The socks foetor permeated the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The garbage foetored so much, the neighbors complained.
